info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

get.summary:
Returns a list of rate-based signatures in IPS package.
Access Group: utmgrp.ips

rate-count.title: Threshold
rate-count.description: The number of matches that must be seen before the signature is triggered.

rate-duration.title: Duration
rate-duration.description: The time period over which matches are counted, in seconds.

rate-track.title: Track By
rate-track.description: The packet property to track. A value of "none" means all matched packets will add to the counter. Otherwise matched packets only add to counter with the same tracked property.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

get.summary:
Returns IPS meta data.
Access Group: utmgrp.ips

cloud_app_ctrl_meta_id.title: Cloud App-Ctrl Meta ID
cloud_app_ctrl_meta_id.description: The application ID which is used to identify cloud signatures.

get.summary:
Return a list of IPS signatures that are on hold due to active hold time.
Access Group: utmgrp.ips

schema.title: On-Hold Signatures
schema.description: List all IPS Signatures being held.

hold_hours.title: Hold Hours
hold_hours.description: The time period until the rule is released, in hours.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: ips_sensor
parameters.description: Optional filter: Provide the name of the IPS sensor to retrieve only the hold signatures being used by that sensor.

get.summary:
Returns IPS session performance status.
Access Group: utmgrp.ips

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Memory allocated by the IPS process, in bytes.

cycles.title: CPU Clock Cycles
cycles.description: CPU clock ticks, frequency or hertz spent on each module.

decoder.title: Decoder
decoder.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on header decoding.

session.title: Session Handling Management
session.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on session handling management.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on network protocol dissectors or parsing.

application.title: Application Control
application.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on application control.

match.title: Signature Pattern Matching
match.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on signature pattern matching.

nc_match.title: Non Pattern Matching
nc_match.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on signature non-pattern matching.

cross_tag.title: Cross Section Tagging
cross_tag.description: Number of CPU cycles spent on signature tagging spanning across each session for matching.

packets.title: Network Packets
packets.description: Network packets processed on each module.

decoder.title: Decoder
decoder.description: Number of network packets processed on header decoding.

session.title: Session Handling Management
session.description: Number of network packets processed on session handling management.

protocol.title: Protocol
protocol.description: Number of network packets processed on network protocol dissectors or parsing.

application.title: Application Control
application.description: Number of network packets processed on application control.

match.title: Signature Pattern Matching
match.description: Number of network packets processed on signature pattern matching.

nc_match.title: Non Pattern Matching
nc_match.description: Number of network packets processed on signature non-pattern matching.

cross_tag.title: Cross Section Tagging
cross_tag.description: Number of network packets processed on signature tagging, spanning across each session for matching.
